page.title: 07CHILDREN'S DOMESDAY THOUGHTS
page.content: Working on the Domesday Project has been O.K. but teachers can get on your nerves when they do everything wrong. It does have it's uses like being interviewed by the Radio & the Evening Argus Newspaper.Here is what two of the girls thought of it all. Claire Brown: aged 12 "We were photographed by the Evening Argus & told to sit in all these different posistions .It was alright though as we were outside everyone got in the way.All in all it was a great experience & I'll never forget it !" Katie Wares: aged 12 Most people have enjoyed the Project and nearly everything to do with it. One boy who was interviewed by Radio Brighton said,"At least we know where the pubs are ,but we didn't like all the walking ! "
